attributes.action: bring back public flogging to anyone convicted of happy slapping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people who are proven to be carrying out this sort of attack should be whipped in public, this would make it clear to those who think it amusing to cause physical and mental pain to others,that we as a society are not going to put up with this sort of behaviour any longer. It is not going to be difficult to prove who is involved as their moronic faces are their as evidence of their own guilt for all to see on the video clips which they think are so amusing.
